title: [Ta'Vaalor, Annatto Bridge]
description: The limestone bridge arcs gently across the Mistydeep, the gentle trickle of the water as it tumbles past the bridge's massive supports, barely carrying on the breeze.  Several city guardsmen stand at alert, examining passersby as they enter and exit the city.

The limestone bridge stretches across the Mistydeep, the quiet trickle of the water as it tumbles past the bridge's massive supports barely carrying on the breeze.  Several city guardsmen stand at alert, examining passersby as they enter and exit the city.
